scripts.backend: powershell -NoProfile -Command "& { cd backend; if (!(Test-Path .venv)) { py -3.12 -m venv .venv }; .\.venv\Scripts\python -m ensurepip --upgrade; .\.venv\Scripts\python -m pip install -q --upgrade pip setuptools wheel; .\.venv\Scripts\python -m pip install -q fastapi uvicorn pydantic python-dotenv requests; .\.venv\Scripts\python -m uvicorn src.api:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 }"
scripts.streamlit: powershell -NoProfile -Command "& { cd backend; if (!(Test-Path .venv)) { py -3.12 -m venv .venv }; .\.venv\Scripts\python -m ensurepip --upgrade; .\.venv\Scripts\python -m pip install -q --upgrade pip setuptools wheel; .\.venv\Scripts\python -m pip install -r requirements.txt; .\.venv\Scripts\python -m streamlit run streamlit_app.py }"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run frontend" "npm run backend" "npm run streamlit"
